  • Uses of Entity in app

    Methods in app with parameters of type Entity
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    CollisionChecker.checkEntityCollision(Entity entity, Farmer[] farmers)
    Checks if entity will collide with any of the farmers in the array (the only enemies on the map currently) If collision will happen, turns on their collisionOn variable to stop movement and returns index of farmer collided with Checked by temporarily moving entities hitbox in the direction it is moving and seeing if collision happens All of these check_____Collision() functions are very similar just for specific scenarios
    int
    CollisionChecker.checkObjectCollision(Entity entity, boolean player)
    If the farmer interacts with an object, do nothing.
    void
    CollisionChecker.checkPlayerCollision(Entity entity)
    Checks if entity is colliding with the player by checking if on its next movement its hitbox will intersect with players Always called by entities other than the player character
    void
    CollisionChecker.checkTileCollision(Entity entity)
    Checking the 2 tiles ahead for collision

    Description

    Farmer
    An entity called Farmer which is the main enemy of the game.
    class 
    Player
    Manages the player's stats, sprites and interactions.

  • Uses of Entity in pathfinding

    Methods in pathfinding with parameters of type Entity
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Pathfinding.searchPath(int goalCol, int goalRow, Entity entity)
    Uses the pathfinding class to find the most efficient path to the player Once path is found, sets the appropriate direction farmer needs to go to avoid collisions based on next tile in path
